title: Reigning champion Pavlyuchenkova into Moscow final
text: Reigning champion Pavlyuchenkova into Moscow final Friday, 23 October 2015 (7 minutes ago) Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova is one match away from retaining her Kremlin Cup title after beating fellow Russian Daria Kasatkina on Friday in the semifinals. MOSCOW - Defending champion Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova reached the Kremlin Cup quarter-finals on Wednesday while US Open winner Flavia Pennetta pulled out through...
